metadata.title: DeathMatchMap
metadata.tagline:
Secluded in the depths of the cosmos lies an ancient building. 
Adorned by grandiose arches and columns, many secrets and unimaginable knowledge are hidden within these walls by the keepers of time, as evil forces seek these powerful artifacts to cause harm to the universe.
Party up with 5 other players against another team in this amazing 6v6 deathmatch experience.
Pick your class and unleash destruction upon its sacred halls.
